remarks: A real function with bounded derivative, has a limit at the upper bound of an open interval.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
ioodvbdlimc1.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
ioodvbdlimc1.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
ioodvbdlimc1.f $e |- ( ph -> F : ( A (,) B ) --> RR ) $.
ioodvbdlimc1.dmdv $e |- ( ph -> dom ( RR _D F ) = ( A (,) B ) ) $.
ioodvbdlimc1.dvbd $e |- ( ph -> E. y e. RR A. x e. ( A (,) B ) ( abs ` ( ( RR _D F ) ` x ) ) <_ y ) $.
ioodvbdlimc1 $p |- ( ph -> ( F limCC A ) =/= (/) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d ph x y $.
